description:
There are few issues affecting the test coverage of vmware driver code.


1. Remove unnecessary event object in wait_for_task. It also causes the coverage tool to miss reporting statements hits after wait_for_task is invoked.

2. Remove the following unused private methods in vmops.py. None of them are utility functions that are referred elsewhere.
    _get_res_pool_ref
    get_console_output
    _delete
title: vmware driver: issues reducing code coverage

comments.content:
There are few issues affecting the test coverage of vmware driver code. 

1. The file permissions on the following files should be changed from 755 to 644
     nova/tests/virt/vmwareapi/test_vmwareapi.py
     nova/tests/virt/vmwareapi/test_vmwareapi_vmops.py
     Reason :- They are not run during code coverage because for nosetests the Normal behavior is to exclude executable modules since they may not be import-safe. 

2. Remove unnecessary event object in wait_for_task. It also causes the coverage tool to miss reporting statements hits after wait_for_task is invoked. 

3. Remove the following unused private methods in vmops.py. None of them are utility functions that are referred elsewhere. 
    _get_res_pool_ref
    get_console_output
    _delete
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~smurugesan

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/48604
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: this isn't really a bug per se, but rather just a cleanup.  Previous patch was abandoned.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo
